ecu_name.description: Name of the ECU. Max 20 characters

dtcs.description: List of Diagnostic Trouble Codes. The list can contain Max 255 DTCs

obd_broadcast_address.description: 11-Bit broadcast address that the ECU listens on to receive OBD requests (functional address). The target address is obd_ecu_address + 0x8

obd_ecu_address.description: 11-Bit ECU address used to response to an OBD request (physical address). The target address is obd_ecu_address + 0x8

can_interface.description: CAN Interface used by the ECU simulator
